name: European Advertising Standards Alliance
membership: EASA is member of the ICC Belgium (International Chamber of Commerce Belgium)
goal:
The European Advertising Standards Alliance (EASA) is the single authoritative voice on advertising self-regulation issues and promotes high ethical standards in commercial communications by means of effective self-regulation.

As a non-profit organisation based in Brussels, it brings together national advertising self-regulatory organisations (SROs) and organisations representing the advertising industry in Europe and beyond.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: Community of Practice for Better Co- and Self-regulation, UCPD, MCAD, AVMS, Data Privacy, Consumer Protection, CPC Regulation,  Alcohol and Health Forum, The EU Platform for Action on Diet, Physical Activity and Health, Data Protection, Cosmetics
